::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell}

:::


The current valid map is identified by **Map code and version**: M4.2.web.orig v1.0.


> Marine ecoregions (Spalding et al. 2008) containing marine aquafarms were identified by consulting global and regional reviews, suitability maps (Gentry et al. 2017) and expertise of authors, proofed by specialist reviewers. These were clipped to the extent of the marine ‘shelf’ base layer as mapped by Harris et al. (2014b) and converted to 30 arc second spatial resolution. Occurrences were aggregated to half degree spatial resolution..

::: {.cell}

:::


You can download and use this file from the following sources:

- GitHub repository ([GeoJSON / TopoJSON versions in GitHUB](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/M4.2.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json))
 - Zenodo repository (EFG map) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG files](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091041))
 - Zenodo repository (bundle of maps) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG versions in compressed file](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419))

::: {.cell}

:::

This section provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**M4.2 Marine aquafarms**](/efg-info/M4_2.qmd).


::: {.cell}

:::

## Available maps

These maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group.

- Indicative Map (**code: M4.2.IM.orig**, version v1.0) 
 - Web navigation (**code: M4.2.web.orig**, version v1.0) 

## Map files

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

M4.2.IM.orig (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/M4.2.IM.orig_v1.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934)
M4.2.web.orig (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/M4.2.web.orig_v1.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419) :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091041) :: [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/M4.2.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json) :: [GitHub repository](layers/M4.2.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json) :: [GitHub repository](M4.2.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json) :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/)

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.
